attributes.action: Cancel exams for 2021 (GCSE and A level)
attributes.additional_details: GCSE and A level students haven’t received adequate teaching time due to the ‘unprecedented pandemic’. Some students haven’t even received face to face online teaching during this time. They have been out of an educational setting for over 6 months due to COVID-19 and therefore these exams will not give a true reflection of each pupils ability. The content hasn’t been covered in enough depth and therefore the exams should be cancelled.
attributes.background: All GCSE exams and A level exams should be cancelled in 2021 and the grades should be based on previous assessments, coursework/class work and predicted grades.
